column5: Beautiful Preston Hollow area of Dallas, 3 miles from Southern Methodist University (SMU) and the George W Bush Library, North Park and Galleria malls, 7 miles to downtown Dallas and Uptown area and Museum Distirct, 7 miles to Cotton Bowl at Fair Park, 7 Miles to American Airlines Center (Dallas Mavericks and Stars & concerts), 15 minutes to Love Field, 30 minutes to DFW, 29 miles to ATT Stadium (Dallas Cowboys) and Globe Life Park (Texas Rangers).
